snippet: The three-year-old Untapable completed an undefeated season against fillies and mares when she took the Breeders’ Cup Distaff by a length and a quarter at Santa Anita Park.
abstract: Horse Racing Roundup; Filly Untapable rallies to win $2 million Breeders' Cup Distaff at Santa Anita Park, completing an undefeated season against fillies and mares; other Breeders' Cup news noted.
lead_paragraph: The three-year-old Untapable completed an undefeated season against fillies and mares when she took the Breeders’ Cup Distaff by a length and a quarter at Santa Anita Park.

headline.main: Favored Untapable Rallies to Win Breeders’ Cup Distaff
headline.print_headline: Untapable Rallies in Distaff, Completing Perfect Season Against Fillies and Mares
